meanings.sent1: The inexpedience of wearing sandals in the snow was evident.
meanings.sent2: The inexpedience of using a fork to drink soup was clear.
meanings.sent3: The inexpedience of wearing a swimsuit to a snowball fight would be quite comical.
meanings.sent4: His inexpedience in the kitchen was like a fish trying to climb a tree.
meanings.sent5: The inexpedience of bringing a beach umbrella to a movie theater made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: The quality of being unsuitable or disadvantageous
meanings.sent1: The inexpedience of leaving your umbrella at home on a rainy day is regrettable.
meanings.sent2: She realized the inexpedience of wearing high heels to a hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: The inexpedience of trying to fit a square peg into a round hole is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His inexpedience in social situations was like a turtle without its shell.
meanings.sent5: The inexpedience of using a fork to eat soup was as awkward as trying to dance with two left feet.
